subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In standards of Hong Kong, Japan and Taiwan, the {{zh-l|*äºº}} component in the lower left of {{lang|zh|å¹¾}} touches but does not cross the horizontal stroke in the {{zh-l|*æˆˆ}} component. In standard of Mainland China, the top of the {{lang|zh|äºº}} component crosses over the horizontal stroke in the {{lang|zh|æˆˆ}} component.
